about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Pillar; ambient music set in the dead of winter composed by Michael Hicks. Also includes an album of bonus tracks, concept art from the game, a photography album and more!

Track Listing

1. Who/What/Where? 02:04
2. Pillar 01:46
3. I Met You... Again 05:54
4. Bonkers (Slow) 04:28
5. Gathering Place 04:10
6. The Cathedral / What Little You Have 02:56
7. Frivolous 01:12
8. Cooperate / Ancient Prophecies 05:42
9. To Find Peace (During Winter) / Unexpected Visitor 02:10
10. Gathering Place pt. 2 / Life in a Museum 06:25

All music written, performed and produced by Michael Hicks

Additional credits:
Adrian Garcia - The Postmaster (track four)
Lee Anne Connaway, Katie Wall, Kaylin King, Marisa Uhls - Library Visitors (track four)

Songs will be placed in the Pillar folder in the Steam Directory: …\Steam\steamapps\common\Pillar\
